member.name: M:Nrc.Qualisys.QLoader.ReportViewer.CanApproveReport
member.summary: Determins if the user can approve or apply a file

item.description: Made it possible to approve and also apply by the same person if the Qloader is set to a single person approval mode.
Changed the parameter of file.Approve from the loginname to the actual user object.

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Overrides OnKeyUp and checks for a Ctrl+C combination. If Ctrl+C was pressed then the contents of the SortableListView are copied to the clipboard.
[JCamp] 7/14/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Project : NRC_Common_Classes Class : WinForms.SortableListView
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a ListView control where the columns are clickable for sorting.
This is still a little buggy but is a good start. For example, if you set the sort order then re-fill the list, things are no longer sorted.
[JCamp] 7/14/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Project : NRC_Common_Classes Class : WinForms.SortableColumn
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a ColumnHeader that also contains the DataType so that the SortableListView control knows how to sort items in this column.
[JCamp] 7/14/2004 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: M:Nrc.Qualisys.QLoader.frmDataGrid.btnExport_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Exports Contents of Grid to Excel document
member.remarks: SK 08-27-2008 Changed from NRC framework's write excel function to built-in DevX export to excel
